title: Welcome
text:
Hello, my name is Camille Morerod. I have a master in Marine Biology and I have a strong interest in data analysis.
If you have any question, please contact me by email or by clicking on any link on the left.

title: Camille Morerod
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  

  
  
I am currently a research assistant at Stockholm University in the Di Santo Lab.
I am interested about data analysis; from the question design to the finding presentation. I especially enjoy exploring, preparing and analyzing the data. R and Excel are my main tools.
During my free time, I like to spend time outside; running, walking and skiing. I also enjoy using my creativity to draw or to do other manual activities.
